name: veloren-translate
description: Translate Veloren blogposts to bt-BR and es
author: Henrique Ramos

scripts.deploy:rss-digester: dotenvx run -- sh -c 'gcloud functions deploy digestRssFeed --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --entry-point main --source apps/rss-digester/dist --region us-central1 --set-env-vars RAW_HTML_BUCKET_NAME=$RAW_HTML_BUCKET_NAME,RSS_FEED_URL=$RSS_FEED_URL'
scripts.deploy:batch-translator: dotenvx run -- sh -c 'gcloud functions deploy batchTranslator --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-event-filters="type=google.cloud.storage.object.v1.finalized" --trigger-event-filters="bucket=$RAW_HTML_BUCKET_NAME" --entry-point main --source apps/batch-translator/dist --region us-central1 --set-env-vars TRANSLATED_HTML_BUCKET_NAME=$TRANSLATED_HTML_BUCKET_NAME'
scripts.deploy:html-to-markdown: dotenvx run -- sh -c 'gcloud functions deploy htmlToMarkdown --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-event-filters="type=google.cloud.storage.object.v1.finalized" --trigger-event-filters="bucket=$TRANSLATED_HTML_BUCKET_NAME" --entry-point main --source apps/html-to-markdown/dist --region us-central1 --set-env-vars TRANSLATED_HTML_BUCKET_NAME=$TRANSLATED_HTML_BUCKET_NAME,MARKDOWN_BUCKET_NAME=$MARKDOWN_BUCKET_NAME'
